_header: Think man whereof thou art wrought
_description: Of the Tokens of God’s Displeasure — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Man be wys & arys / & thynk on lyf þat lestenit ay’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Thynk man qwerof þou art wroutPowre & nakyd þou were
                    heder browt…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Go to cherche & do the schryf& bryng thi sowle in
                    redy way
